item.title: BlueJ Trick - Save your Object Bench using Test Fixtures
item.description: You can save and re-create your Object Bench with a trick that uses the Unit Test Support in BlueJ, especially “Object Bench to Test Fixture” “Test Fixture to Object Bench”: 1. Save the state of your object bench Let’s say you have created a lot of objects manually and want to reuse them. To save the state of your Object Bench, first create a Test Class for an arbitrary class: Now, call “Object Bench to Test Fixture” from the Test Class’ context menu.
